verses.verse: And they <S%H935>brought<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H3322>set<s%> it in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5186>pitched<s%> for <S%H7126>it<s%>: and they offered <S%H8002>burnt-offerings<s%> and <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

And when <S%H1732>David<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5927>offering<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and the <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>, he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And he <S%H2505>dealt<s%> to every <S%H376>one<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, both <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman<s%>, to every <S%H376>one<s%> a <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and a portion of <S%H829>flesh<s%>, and a cake of <S%H809>raisins<s%>.

And he <S%H5414>appointed<s%> certain of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and to <S%H2142>celebrate<s%> and to <S%H3034>thank<s%> and <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

Asaph <S%H623><s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, and <S%H4932>second<s%> to him <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%>, and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth<s%>, and <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%>, and <S%H4993>Mattithiah<s%>, and <S%H446>Eliab<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%>, and <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%>, and <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%>, with <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> and with <S%H3658>harps<s%>; and <S%H623>Asaph<s%> with <S%H4700>cymbals<s%>, sounding <S%H8085>aloud<s%>;

and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> and <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

Then on that <S%H3117>day<s%> did <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7218>first<s%> <S%H5414>ordain<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>.
O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H7121>call<s%> upon his <S%H8034>name<s%>; Make <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H5949>doings<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto <S%H2167>him<s%>, sing praises unto <S%H7878>him<s%>; Talk ye of all his marvellous <S%H6381>works<s%>.
Glory <S%H1984><s%> ye in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>; Let the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of them <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Seek <S%H1875><s%> ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> and his <S%H5797>strength<s%>; <S%H1245>Seek<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H8548>evermore<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his <S%H6381>marvellous<s%> works that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%>, His <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>,
O ye <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, Ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, his chosen <S%H972>ones<s%>.
He is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>; His <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, The <S%H1697>word<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>,
The covenant which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, And his <S%H7621>oath<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>,
And <S%H5975>confirmed<s%> the same unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for a <S%H2706>statute<s%>, To <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>,
Saying <S%H559><s%>, Unto thee will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, The <S%H2256>lot<s%> of your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>;
When ye were but a <S%H4557>few<s%> men in <S%H4592>number<s%>, Yea, very few, and sojourners in <S%H1481>it<s%>;
And they <S%H1980>went<s%> about from <S%H1471>nation<s%> to <S%H1471>nation<s%>, And from one <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.
He <S%H3240>suffered<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%> to do them <S%H6231>wrong<s%>; <S%H3198>Yea<s%>, he reproved kings for their <S%H4428>sakes<s%>,
Saying <S%H5060><s%>, Touch not mine <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H5030>ones<s%>, And do my prophets no <S%H7489>harm<s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, all the <S%H776>earth<s%>; Show <S%H1319>forth<s%> his <S%H3444>salvation<s%> from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%>.
Declare <S%H5608><s%> his <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, His marvellous <S%H6381>works<s%> among all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.
For <S%H1419>great<s%> is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>: He also is to be <S%H3372>feared<s%> above all <S%H430>gods<s%>.
For all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H457>idols<s%>: But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
Honor <S%H1935><s%> and <S%H1935>majesty<s%> are before <S%H6440>him<s%>: <S%H5797>Strength<s%> and <S%H2304>gladness<s%> are in his <S%H4725>place<s%>.
Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, ye <S%H4940>kindreds<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, <S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> and <S%H5797>strength<s%>;

Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> due unto his <S%H8034>name<s%>: <S%H5375>Bring<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7812>him<s%>: Worship <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1927>array<s%>.
Tremble <S%H2342><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H776>him<s%>, all the earth: The <S%H8398>world<s%> also is <S%H3559>established<s%> that it cannot be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.

Let the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%>, and let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>; And let them <S%H559>say<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H4427>reigneth<s%>.
Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar<s%>, and the <S%H4393>fulness<s%> <S%H7704>thereof<s%>; Let the field <S%H5970>exult<s%>, and all that is therein;
Then shall the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>wood<s%> sing for <S%H7442>joy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For he <S%H935>cometh<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for he is <S%H2896>good<s%>; For his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3467>ye<s%>, Save <S%H430>us<s%>, O God of our <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, And gather us <S%H6908>together<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us from the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, To give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, And to <S%H7623>triumph<s%> in thy <S%H8416>praise<s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, From <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> even to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>, and <S%H1984>praised<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

So he <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H6440>there<s%>, before the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H623>Asaph<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>, as every <S%H3117>day<s%>'s <S%H1697>work<s%> <S%H3117>required<s%>;

and <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> with their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%>; <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> and <S%H2621>Hosah<s%> to be <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%>;

and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in the high <S%H1116>place<s%> that was at <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>,

to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening<s%>, even according to all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

and with them <S%H1968>Heman<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>, and the <S%H7605>rest<s%> that were <S%H1305>chosen<s%>, who were <S%H5344>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%>, to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, because his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>;

and with them <S%H1968>Heman<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> for those that should <S%H8085>sound<s%> <S%H3627>aloud<s%>, and with instruments for the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> to be at the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.
And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5437>returned<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%>.
